name: be-studio-ghibli-tracker
description: Studio Ghibli Tracker is a web application that allows us to view the catalog of films produced by Studio Ghibli, as well as register a personal rating and keep track of which ones you have already seen and which ones you have not yet. ## Conig-envirement --- The envirement is created in Nest.js using Node.js. ## Built With The next thecnologies were added to build and run this project.
